textTemplates.name: AdviseNoContact
textTemplates.text: A case contact has not been specified. Please specify contacts before selecting Service Request type, as no service requests should be submitted without case contact details being captured.

textTemplates.text:

If deleting an email service Domain Name
If changing an service Existing Domain Name Existing IP Address New Domain Name New IP Address

textTemplates.text: Source Zone: Souce IPs: Destination Zone: Destination IPs: Protocol: Port: Rule: Description: Nat'ed IP Address (if Applicable)

[N4L supplying script]

textTemplates.name: CustomisedFirewallRuleinclProvisionandDisconnect5D
textTemplates.text: Source Zone: Souce IPs: Destination Zone: Destination IPs: Protocol: Port: Rule: Description:

textTemplates.name: CustomisedHostedVCBridgeServicesRCV5D
textTemplates.text: [N4L supplying info and/or attachment] i.e. Provision/Change/Relinquish hosted videoconferencing bridge service for a Customer

textTemplates.name: CustomisedMngdNetworkGRETunnelDiverseAccess5D
textTemplates.text:
[N4L supplying info and/or attachment]
School Router name: Local Public IP address(IP assigned to G0/0 of CLNE): Remote Public IP address(IP assigned to WAN interfaced of peer Router/Firewall): Internet subnet of local LAN: Internal subnet of remote LAN: Private subnet assigned for Tunnel Interfaces: IP address assigned to Local tunnel interface: IP address assigned to remote tunnel interface: Static route to reach remote LAN: Keep Alive timer: Please set keep-alive timer to 10 seconds manually

textTemplates.name: CustomisedRelocateONTCLNE5D
textTemplates.text:
Questions Where is the ONT/ CLNE being relocated? Is it within the same bulding? Or in another building? What is the approximate distance (in metres)? Can you provide floorplans/ site plans? Any known Health and Safety issue to be aware of (i.e. asbestos/ construction)? Is there any pre-existing (or new - potentially) ducting available to be used? Is the old building going to be demolished/ refurbished What is the date for demolition? What is the date for services to be reconnected/ recommissioned? What is the impact if it is not reconnected on this specific date?
Relocation details: Server room relocated (FROM) Building: Level: Room: In room location/rack details:
Server room relocated (TO) Building: Level: Room: In room location/rack details:
Contact Name: {!sObjContact.FirstName} {!sObjContact.LastName} Contact Phone: {!sObjContact.Phone} Contact Mobile: {!sObjContact.MobilePhone} Contact Email: {!sObjContact.Email}
Alternative Contact Name: Alternative Contact Phone: Alternative Contact Mobile: Alternative Contact Email:

textTemplates.name: CustomisedWebfilterScansafeAD5D
textTemplates.text:
[N4L supplying info to turn on/off]
[N4L, please include the following where applicable] Bypass Domain Names IP Address

textTemplates.name: NoChargePREAPPROVEDFirewallRule4H
textTemplates.text: Source Zone: Souce IPs: Destination Zone: Destination IPs: Protocol: Port: Rule: Description:

textTemplates.name: Otherrequests5D
textTemplates.text: [N4L, please include attachments and further information where possible]

textTemplates.name: SerReqNULL
textTemplates.text: The field Spark Service Request Type: {!SerReqType}, is not specified. Please specify and save the info

textTemplates.name: SimpleFirewallRule1Client8H
textTemplates.text:
Source Zone: Souce IPs: Destination Zone: Destination IPs: Protocol: Port: Rule: Description:
------------------------------ The requested move/add/change is a port forward:
Interface/VLAN: Internet External IP`: [Likely WAN IP of school's router] External Port TCP/UDP only: [e.g. 3389] Internal Host: [e.g. 192.168.1.1] Internal Port (TCP/UDP only): [e.g. 3389] Protocol: [TCP/UDP/IP] Description:

textTemplates.name: SimpleIPAddress8H
textTemplates.text:
[N4L supplying script]
[N4L, please include the following where applicable] Vlan New ip address of the interface port and the subnet mask Secondary IP Address? (Y/N) If secondary ip address required: Provide Details Subinterface Required? (Y/N) If subinterface Required: Provide Details

textTemplates.name: SimpleMngdNetworkVLANDHCP10H
textTemplates.text:
(Remove VLAN or DHCP section if not relevant)
VLAN [N4L, please include the following where applicable] VLAN# Subnet Mask IP Address of Sub Interface: Firewall rules
DHCP (Yes/No) [N4L, please include the following where applicable] DHCP Subnet Mask DNS Servers Excluded addresses Default gateway address

textTemplates.name: SimpleN4LUser10H
textTemplates.text: [N4L to provide parameters regarding 'User' request i.e. what? Create, Reset, Unlock or Remove. Which systems? MGP, HPSC, Remedy, Infovista, Cortex, Cost Manager, Secure Mail, Web Filter or InfoVista]
